default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Keep going ahead and you'll see the Gate of Hell. Are you here to welcome me, or to bid farewell to me?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: A good piece of work needs to be polished and refined carefully.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The present me is finally able to breathe life into them...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: There, there. It's normal to get scared...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: The contorted faces and terrified screams are truly irresistible.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: We'll start again from scratch.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Face your fear head-on!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Oh... Such a warm embrace...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hello, Chief. Did you have fun last night?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I've always been devoted to nature, but this world is no different than hell to me.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Artist? Do I deserve this title in your opinion?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Only when you're most frightened will you follow your most primal instincts... Those are the true colors of humans.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Sculpture is not a superficial art. It's a form of creation that touches bones and flesh and forms the shape of life.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: My chisel and hammer will surely carve through those hypocritical illusions and subvert everything!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: If I could... I wish to frame your terrified face just for myself to admire... Haha, don't be scared, it's only an idea.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: If you call me the witch of the night, then don't blame me for peeking into your heart. I wish to see life that erupts from the inside out. It will germinate, grow, and bloom into a flower named love...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Since I'm free... Why don't I carve a few flowers on these ugly iron bars?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Alright, I've memorized it. I'll carve holes on you later according to the order of your touches just now.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Okay, okay. You're already eye-catching enough... What? You won't believe me unless I actually take out my eyeballs and give them to you?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Go out to find inspiration? Can I come back before the evening?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I've found my inspiration. Now, let the Witching Hour begin.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Hmm! It's carved perfectly.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Do you want my mark?

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: What? Do you want to nurture some artsy vibe as well?

sculptor_s_nest.title: Obtain Attire
sculptor_s_nest.text: Welcome to the sculptor's nest, my most secret garden. Herein lies fears and struggles, distortions and pain... as well as boundless love.

sculptor_s_nest.title: Greeting
sculptor_s_nest.text: As soon as I prayed to the sculpture to meet you, you appeared before my eyes. Do I have a unique power of making wishes come true?

sculptor_s_nest.title: Ordinary Contact 1
sculptor_s_nest.text: It's the greatest joy to carve out the imagination with my own hands.

sculptor_s_nest.title: Ordinary Contact 2
sculptor_s_nest.text: Fix your gaze on the sculptures. If you can't look fear in the eye, you might get crushed by it...

sculptor_s_nest.title: Ordinary Contact 3
sculptor_s_nest.text: For convenience's sake, I added many practical little pockets on my clothes to hold carving tools.

sculptor_s_nest.title: Ordinary Contact 4
sculptor_s_nest.text: Why is this work unfinished? Hehe... Maybe "she" needs someone who loves "her" to make up for the missing half of her heart...

sculptor_s_nest.title: Idle
sculptor_s_nest.text: Thump, thump, thump... You hear that? I'm sculpting heartbeats.

sculptor_s_nest.title: Special Attention
sculptor_s_nest.text: I can't work properly if you keep staring at me like this... Hmm? Do you want to model for me or something?

sculptor_s_nest.title: Pat Head
sculptor_s_nest.text: Did the artist make the hat special, or did the hat become the symbol of the artist?

sculptor_s_nest.title: Level Up
sculptor_s_nest.text: With a flash of lightning and a speeding heart, Venus is born from my hands.

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Obtain Attire
virtuoso_of_jade.text: The jade emits warm haze, its body transparent. Your emotions and thoughts live through the carved jade. What do you seek from me, young carver?

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Greeting
virtuoso_of_jade.text: Let's see. What kind of jade piece do you want to carve today?

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Ordinary Contact 1
virtuoso_of_jade.text: Raw jade born under the moon is always hidden in rubble. Ordinary carvers often overlook its true value. Will you become a skilled carver with such acumen?

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Ordinary Contact 2
virtuoso_of_jade.text: A gentleman's character is often compared to the quality of jade. People wear limpid jade accessories to demonstrate their virtue and good manners... Hmm, judging by your demeanor and skills, you'll be a piece of pure jade.

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Idle
virtuoso_of_jade.text: These discarded raw stones are good for carving a few simple accessories to ease this boredom.

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Special Attention
virtuoso_of_jade.text: Have you decided? What kind of ornament do you want me to carve this jade into?

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Level Up
virtuoso_of_jade.text: You're developing an eye for good rough stones. Keep it up~

virtuoso_of_jade.title: Annoyed
virtuoso_of_jade.text: Never pass jade with your hands. I won't remind you again.
